department.ch: 學習與教學研究所碩士班

goal.ch:
修課學生：
1. 能了解質性研究的意義與方法。
2. 能針對自己的興趣提出質性研究的方法。
goal.en:
Participants can develop

1.Ability to comprehend the significance and methods of qualitative research.
2.Ability to propose qualitative research methods tailored to one‘s own interests.

outline.ch:
課程簡介與授課目標
質性研究（qualitative research） 透過非數字化的資料蒐集，來探究事物的意義、概念、特質、符號和隱喻等，擅長於回答人類經驗中關於「為何」（why） 與「如何」（how） 的問題。而量化研究應用統計、數學與運算方法（或者模型）來探究可以被觀察的現象，擅長回答假設印證（hypothesis testing）、因果關係（causal relationship）與可推論性（generalizability）的問題。兩個研究方法都是具有科學精神的研究方法，但目的不同、方法不同、語言不同，形成研究方法的本體論、認識論與價值觀也有差異。
本課程藉由論文的研讀、批判與反思，來達成以下目標：
一、能了解質性研究的意義與方法。
二、能針對自己的興趣提出質性研究的方法。
本課程協助對質性研究有興趣的研究生發展質性研究的基本理解，透過案例解析了解敘事研究、扎根理論、民族誌、個案研究等常用的質性研究方法，並嘗試撰寫研究計畫第三章-研究方法。主要學習單元活動始於指定文章閱讀、摘要撰寫(於FB社群)、課堂討論與研究反思，讓修課同學透過此過程深入質性研究的基本認識論與方法論。
授課方式
本課程由許多「學習單元」組成，每一個「學習單元」包含以下四個步驟：
1.「學習者」精讀指定文章。透過精讀來了解作者的核心論點和預設立場。
2.「FB線上討論」貼文與回文：依給定的格式轉寫貼文（主要是作者的核心論點），張貼於課程的FB線上社群，並至少針對一篇貼文給與評論 （回文）。
3.「小組口頭報告」：每一次的指定閱讀，均有指定小組協助統整指定文章與「FB線上討論」的重點，在當週課堂上報告。報告的目的是開啟討論對話空間，而不是考試。
4.「深入對話」：小組口頭報告的過程，也是深入對話進行的起點。我們利用這個形式來深入質性研究相關議題，總結一個單元的學習。
outline.en:
This course aims to assist graduate students interested in qualitative research in developing a basic understanding of qualitative research. Through case analyses, students will learn about commonly used qualitative research methods such as narrative research, grounded theory, ethnography, and case studies. They will also attempt to write the third chapter of a research proposal, focusing on research methods. The main learning activities of each unit involve assigned article readings, summarizing (on the course‘s Facebook community), classroom discussions, and research reflections, allowing students to delve into the fundamental epistemology and methodology of qualitative research.
Teaching Methodology:
This course consists of several “learning units,“ each comprising the following four steps:
1.Close Reading by “Learners“: Students will thoroughly read assigned articles to understand the authors‘ core arguments and perspectives.
2.Online Discussion on Facebook (FB): Students will post and comment according to given formats (primarily focusing on the authors‘ core arguments) on the course‘s FB online community. They are required to comment on at least one post (response) related to the assigned readings.
3.Group Oral Presentation: Each assigned reading will have a designated group tasked with synthesizing the key points from the assigned article and the FB online discussion. They will present their findings during the class session of that week. The purpose of these presentations is to initiate discussion rather than being an examination.
4.In-depth Dialogue: The group oral presentation serves as a starting point for in-depth dialogue. We utilize this format to delve deeper into issues related to qualitative research, culminating in a summary of the unit‘s learning.
This teaching approach aims to engage students actively in the learning process, fostering critical thinking and deeper understanding of qualitative research principles and methodologies.

gradMethod.ch:
1.「線上討論」:  FB線上討論 40 ％
2.小組口頭報告:  2次 20 ％
3.學期初與學期末「研究方法」撰寫+「研究方法前後觀點異同與產生差異的理由」40 ％
4.「我的學習歷程」 10 ％
gradMethod.en:
1.Online Discussion: FB Online Discussion - 40％
2.Group Oral Presentation: 2 times - 20％
3.Writing “Research Methods“ at the Beginning and End of Semester + “Reasons for Differences in Perspectives Before and After Research Methods“ - 40％
4.“My Learning Journey“ - 10％
